question: What nickname did CNN International give to Bursa due to its automotive industry?
asked_question_translated: Akú prezývku dala CNN International mestu Bursa kvôli jeho automobilovému priemyslu?
answer: CNN International dala mestu Bursa prezývku "Detroit východu" kvôli jeho automobilovému priemyslu.
answer_translated_eng: CNN International has nicknamed Bursa the "Detroit of the East" because of its automotive industry.
